ref.div: Energy Research Institute (ERI), Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory (LBNL), and Rocky Mountain Institute (RMI). Reinventing Fire: China—A Roadmap for China’s Revolution in Energy Consumption and Production to 2050, Avaiable at https://www.rmi.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/OCS_Report_ReinventingFireChina_2016.pdf (2016).
